tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE medication_adherence_tracking (
    patient_id INT,
    medication_name VARCHAR(50),
    dosage_amount INT,
    dosage_frequency VARCHAR(50),
    last_taken TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  patient_age INT,
  patient_gender VARCHAR(10),
  phone_number VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Medications (
  medication_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  medication_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  dosage FLOAT,
  frequency VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  patient_id UUID REFERENCES Patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE reminders (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 patient_id INT,
 medication_name VARCHAR,
 dosage INT,
 reminder_time TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE patients (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 name VARCHAR,
 age INT,
 contact_number VARCHAR,
 email VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE adherence_tracking (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 patient_id INT,
 medication_name VARCHAR,
 dosage_given INT,
 dosage_missed INT,
 last_adherence TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE MedicationSchedule (
  schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  medication_id INT,
  patient_id INT,
  schedule_date DATE,
  time_of_day TIME,
  FOREIGN KEY (medication_id) REFERENCES Medications(medication_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Reminders (
  reminder_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  schedule_id INT,
  reminder_date DATE,
  reminder_time TIME,
  is_sent BOOLEAN,
  FOREIGN KEY (schedule_id) REFERENCES MedicationSchedule(schedule_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ReminderLogs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  reminder_id INT,
  patient_id INT,
  log_date DATE,
  log_time TIME,
  log_message TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (reminder_id) REFERENCES Reminders(reminder_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id)
);
